name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Sales Engineer with a strong background in technical sales and business development, leveraging 13+ years of full stack development experience to bridge the gap between technology and client needs. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in communicating complex technical concepts in **Polish** and **English**, fostering strong customer relationships through effective communication skills and organizational expertise.

Knowledgeable in **monitoring systems**, **wastewater technology**, and **water treatment equipment**, enabling the delivery of solutions that resonate with clients' operational requirements. Proven strategic planner with a knack for aligning technology solutions with business objectives, ensuring compliance with industry regulations. Adept at collaborating in team environments to drive project success and adaptability.
